level.text: The employer shall advise the employee of provisions as they relate to determining wages based on gratuities and an employer taking a gratuity allowance from the wage of an employee shall have the burden of proving the employee received gratuities at least as much as the gratuity allowance taken.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 41 DCR 187 (January 14, 1994).
